scripts.compile_compiler: echo Compiling VoxelScript Compiler && cd src && npx tsc && cp voxelscript.pegjs *.hpp base_ts.ts build_tsconfig.json build && cd ..
scripts.compile_extension: npm run compile_compiler && echo Compiling VoxelScript Extension && cd voxelscript_extension && npm run compile && cd .. && mkdir -p ./voxelscript_extension/server/build/voxelscript_compiler && cp -r ./src/build/* ./voxelscript_extension/server/build/voxelscript_compiler
